attributes.action: The Government should introduce legislation to remove Chakrabarti's  peerage
attributes.additional_details: (Baroness) Chakrabarti's report into antisemitism in the Labour Party is compromised by its failure to deliver a comprehensive set of recommendations, to provide a definition of antisemitism, or suggest ways of dealing with antisemitic incidents. In addition to join the Labour Party in April accept a peerage as a nominee of the Labour Leader and recent appointment to Corbyn's Shadow Cabinet, has thrown into question the independence of the Labour Party's inquiry at expense of Jewish human rights
attributes.background: With regard to the recent report of the select committee, the government should introduce legislation to remove Chakrabarti's  peerage . We believe Her peerage was an abuse of parliament and has made it more difficult to confront antisemitism.
